text: Anna Karenina is a 1953 Russian historical drama movie directed by Tatyana Lukashevich and based on the 1877 novel of the same name by Leo Tolstoy. It stars Alla Tarasova, Nikolai Sosnin, Pavel Massalsky, Viktor Stanitsyn and was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Tatyana Lukashevich
title: Anna Karenina (1953 movie)
